iti44:2.3: Saupadisesa ca nibbanadhatu, anupadisesa ca nibbanadhatu.
iti44:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu araham hoti khinasavo vusitava katakaraniyo ohitabharo anuppattasadattho parikkhinabhavasamyojano sammadannavimutto.
iti44:3.3: Tassa titthanteva pancindriyani yesam avighatatta manapamanapam paccanubhoti, sukhadukkham patisamvedeti.
iti44:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu araham hoti khinasavo vusitava katakaraniyo ohitabharo anuppattasadattho parikkhinabhavasamyojano sammadannavimutto.
iti44:4.3: Tassa idheva, bhikkhave, sabbavedayitani anabhinanditani siti bhavissanti.
iti44:7.1: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavata, iti me sutanti.
